nodes.text: Mikfa Faaus was a male Gungan who lived near the Lake Retreat on Naboo during the Galactic Civil War. He used to repair kitchen refrigerator units and other devices.

In 1 ABY he was approached by a spacer on the advice of the Ithorian chef Amyva Va'new. The spacer was looking for detailed information about Corellian fried ice cream fryers and how they worked. He planned to reverse-engineer a broken fryer and create a schematic that could be used to manufacture a new one.
Faaus did not know much about such fryers, but he gave him the coordinates of a Devaronian named Eteto Topan on Tatooine that knew more about this device.

Mikfa Faaus is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. In the game, he can be found near a shuttleport at the Lake Retreat. He is part of the quest line "Find out more about the Cooker" (and the interconnected Collection Portable Deep Fryer) that starts when the player inspects a broken ice cream fryer. The player then has to talk to several NPCs on different planets to gather more information about the fryer. When he finishes the quest, the player is rewarded with a schematic for a Corellian Fried Ice Cream Fryer.
The quest line was added to the game with Chapter 9 in April 2008
